member.name: T:PremierLeague.Logic.IModifyLogic
member.summary: Provides functionality for the CRUD operations that modify the database (add, change, delete).

member.summary: Adds a manager into the database.
member.param: The manager to be added.

member.name: M:PremierLeague.Logic.IModifyLogic.DeleteManager(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a manager.
member.param: The id of the manager to be deleted.

member.summary: Changes the name of the manager.

The new name of the manager.

member.summary: Changes the birthday of the manager.

The new birthday of the manager.
